a1

Class ActionToggleColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • a1.ActionOnModel
        • a1.ActionToggleColor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action

    public class ActionToggleColor
extends ActionOnModel
    An action that toggles the model's color This class implements the following requirement from the Assignment 1 description: A key binding that toggles the triangle between a single solid color and a gradient of three colors when user presses the ‘c’ key.
    Author:
    Graeme Knowles
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private float[] color1
      The first color pole of the gradient to toggle to
      private float[] color2
      The second color pole of the gradient to toggle to
      private float[] color3
      The third color pole of the gradient to toggle to
      private float[] solidColor
      The single solid color to toggle to
      private boolean toggle
      The boolean that is toggled back and forth to determine whether or not to toggle to the gradient or the solid color
